story.text: The similar beer drinkers look to the drinkers before them and adjust their consumption to match. See [[Beer Drinking Scenarios]].
We take a few bottles of beer from the wall and leave the remainder for following drinkers.

Bottles of Beer
Take a Few Down
SUM Bottles of Beer
Try adding more drinking strategies to this scenario to consume the remaining beer.<li> [[Drink Beer Slowly]] <li> [[Drink Beer Similarly]] <li> [[Drink Beer in Proportion]]
